sourcesContent:
<template>
     {{title}}
</template>

<script>
import Typewriter from "typewriter-vue";

export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {
    Typewriter,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      title: "selam test",
      speed: "30",
      replace: [
        {from: "Vue", to: "React?"},
        {from: "Typewriter React?", to: "Joking, it`s Vue!"},
      ],
    }
  },
  methods:{
    typeWriter(){
      if (i < txt.length) {
        document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML += txt.charAt(i);
        i++;
        setTimeout(typeWriter, speed);
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
